channel.title: Not spoofed Mac sent to router?
channel.description: Good day After read this https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Computer_Security_Education#Random_MAC_address the better option is to use another wifi card. The question below is related to Qubes but I believe that could be also to other OS. Going to network connection of a sys-net I see the real MAC address is detected in the "device place" also when it is spoofed. Could be it sent to router or is here because in a way the VM has to have a wifi card attached?

item.title: Not spoofed Mac sent to router?

Have you tried this https://www.qubes-os.org/doc/anonymizing-your-mac-address/ ?

Good day
After read this

Whonix

Computer Security Education

Basic Computer Security Advice. Useful Before Installing Whonix for Better Security.


the better option is to use another wifi card. The question below is related to Qubes but I believe that could be also to other OS.
Going to network connection of a sys-net I see the real MAC address is detected in the “device place” also when it is spoofed. Could be it sent to router or is here because in a way the VM has to have a wifi card attached?
